subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Heisley, a co-founder and chairman of the Heico Companies, bought the floundering Vancouver Grizzlies in 2000 and soon moved them to Memphis.
snippet: Mr. Heisley, a co-founder and chairman of the Heico Companies, bought the floundering Vancouver Grizzlies in 2000 and soon moved them to Memphis.
